title: Add pyproject.toml dependencies for HuggingFace support
description:
**As a** Consoul developer
**I want** langchain-huggingface added to project dependencies
**So that** HuggingFace provider support can be installed and used

**Context:**
The langchain-huggingface package provides HuggingFace integration for LangChain. It's a separate package that needs to be added to pyproject.toml dependencies, similar to other provider packages.

Latest version: langchain-huggingface 1.0.1+ (as of 2025)

Optional dependencies for local model execution:
- transformers: Local model loading
- torch: PyTorch backend
- accelerate: Model loading optimizations
- bitsandbytes: 4-bit quantization support

**Technical Notes:**
- pyproject.toml - Add to dependencies list (around line 45-52)
- Follow pattern of other langchain-* packages
- Add to [tool.poetry.dependencies] section (line 111-117)
- Add to mypy ignore list (line 265-272)
- Consider making transformers/torch optional extras
- Minimum version: ^1.0.0

**Acceptance Criteria:**

Given I check pyproject.toml dependencies
When I review the dependencies list
Then langchain-huggingface>=1.0.0 is included

Given I check poetry.lock
When I run poetry lock
Then langchain-huggingface is resolved with correct version

Given I install the project
When I run poetry install
Then langchain-huggingface is installed successfully

Given I check mypy configuration
When I review mypy overrides
Then langchain_huggingface.* is added to ignore list

**Testing Considerations:**
- Run poetry lock to verify dependency resolution
- Run poetry install to test installation
- Verify no dependency conflicts
- Test that mypy ignores langchain_huggingface imports
- Check that pre-commit hooks work with new dependency

**Implementation Hints:**
```toml
# In dependencies section (line ~45)
dependencies = [
    "textual>=6.5.0",
    "langchain>=1.0.0",
    "langchain-openai>=1.0.0",
    "langchain-anthropic>=1.0.0",
    "langchain-google-genai>=2.0.0",
    "langchain-ollama>=1.0.0",
    "langchain-huggingface>=1.0.0",  # Add this
    # ... rest
]

# In [tool.poetry.dependencies] section (line ~111)
[tool.poetry.dependencies]
python = "^3.10"
textual = "^6.5.0"
langchain = "^1.0.5"
langchain-openai = "^1.0.2"
langchain-anthropic = "^1.0.2"
langchain-google-genai = "^3.0.1"
langchain-ollama = "^1.0.0"
langchain-huggingface = "^1.0.1"  # Add this

# In mypy configuration (line ~265)
[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
module = [
    "textual.*",
    "langchain.*",
    "langchain_openai.*",
    "langchain_anthropic.*",
    "langchain_google_genai.*",
    "langchain_ollama.*",
    "langchain_huggingface.*",  # Add this
    # ... rest
]

# Optional: Add extra for local models
[tool.poetry.extras]
huggingface-local = ["transformers", "torch", "accelerate"]
```

Files to modify:
- pyproject.toml (add dependency)
- poetry.lock (regenerate with poetry lock)

Dependencies: SOUL-121
